trans-unit.note: Bundle display name
Bundle name

trans-unit.source: Vocable uses your device's front camera to detect minimal changes in head orientation and position. This allows users with limited mobility to control an on-screen pointer to interact with the app. Camera data is used expressly for controlling the on-screen pointer. This data is not stored or transmitted in any way. Vocable needs permission to use the camera for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: الأمامية لجهازك لاكتشاف الحد الأدنى من التغييرات في اتجاه الرأس وموضعه. يتيح ذلك للمستخدمين محدودي الحركة التحكم في مؤشر على الشاشة للتفاعل مع التطبيق. تُستخدم بيانات الكاميرا بشكل صريح للتحكم في المؤشر على الشاشة. لا يتم تخزين هذه البيانات أو نقلها بأي شكل من الأشكال. يحتاج Vocable إذنًا لاستخدام الكاميرا لهذا الغرض.
trans-unit.note: Camera usage description

trans-unit.source: Vocable uses the microphone only when listening mode is enabled. Vocable transcribes audio into text; it is not stored or transmitted except when the user chooses to share this information anonymously with developers to help improve listening mode.
trans-unit.target: يستخدم Vocable الميكروفون فقط عند تمكين وضع الاستماع. Vocable ينقل الصوت إلى نص ؛ لا يتم تخزينها أو نقلها إلا عندما يختار المستخدم مشاركة هذه المعلومات بشكل مجهول مع المطورين للمساعدة في تحسين وضع الاستماع.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Microphone Usage Description

trans-unit.source: When listening mode is enabled, Vocable uses speech recognition to convert audio data into text. Transcribed speech is not stored or transmitted except when the user chooses to share this information anonymously with developers to help improve listening mode.
trans-unit.target: عند تمكين وضع الاستماع ، يستخدم Vocable التعرف على الكلام لتحويل البيانات الصوتية إلى نص. لا يتم تخزين الكلام المكتوب أو نقله إلا عندما يختار المستخدم مشاركة هذه المعلومات بشكل مجهول مع المطورين للمساعدة في تحسين وضع الاستماع.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Speech Recognition Usage Description
Categories Header title. This text appears in the Settings flow when navigating to the list of Categories

Setting option for a category. Navigates the user to a list of phrases within the category where the phrases can be deleted or edited.
Setting option for a category. Button that will delete the category. Tapping the button will display an alert confirmation.
Setting option for a category. Navigates the user to a keyboard view where they can edit the Category name.

Toggle option for a category within settings. Can be toggled on or off to hide or show the category in the main view. Hiding the category will also move the category in settings to the end of the list.
changes to an existing phrase were saved successfully
Toast message that appears after saving edits made to the Category title
Category empty state button. This button appears with the empty state to allow the user to add a phrase

trans-unit.note: Category empty state. This empty state appears when there are no phrases in the category in both the main screen and settings screen.

Confirm alert action title

trans-unit.source: Turning off head tracking will make the app touch mode only. Would you like to continue?
trans-unit.target: سيؤدي إيقاف تشغيل تتبع الرأس إلى جعل التطبيق يعمل باللمس فقط. هل ترغب في الاستمرار؟

trans-unit.source: Please move closer to the device.
trans-unit.target: من فضلك إقترب أكثر من الجهاز.
trans-unit.note: Warning message presented to the user when the head tracking system

trans-unit.source: When someone asks a question out loud, Vocable will offer quick response options.
trans-unit.target: عندما يسأل شخص ما سؤالاً بصوت عالٍ ، سيقدم Vocable خيارات استجابة سريعة.
trans-unit.note: Listening mode empty state message for when listening has began but no responses have been displayed yet
Listening mode empty state title for when listening has began but no responses have been displayed yet

trans-unit.source: Not sure what to suggest. Please use the keyboard or select an existing phrase to reply.
trans-unit.target: لست متأكدا ما أقترحه. يرجى استخدام لوحة المفاتيح أو تحديد عبارة موجودة للرد عليها.
trans-unit.note: Listen mode empty state message for when no responses could be generated
Listen mode empty state title for when no responses could be generated
Listen mode empty state action that will allow the user to open the Settings app in order to grant microphone permissions.

trans-unit.source:
Vocable needs to use the microphone to enable Listening Mode. Please enable microphone access in the system Settings app.
You can also disable Listening Mode to hide this category in Vocable's settings.
trans-unit.target:
يحتاج Vocable إلى استخدام الميكروفون لتمكين وضع الاستماع. يرجى تمكين الوصول إلى الميكروفون في تطبيق إعدادات النظام.
يمكنك أيضًا تعطيل وضع الاستماع لإخفاء هذه الفئة في إعدادات Vocable.
trans-unit.note: Listening mode empty state message for when microphone permissions are required, but the user has denied them
Listening mode empty state title for when microphone permissions are required, but the user has denied them
Listen mode empty state action that will allow the user to grant access to microphone permissions via the system permissions alert.

trans-unit.source: Vocable needs microphone access to enable Listening Mode. The button below presents an iOS permission dialog that Vocable's head tracking cannot interract with.
trans-unit.target: يحتاج Vocable إلى الوصول إلى الميكروفون لتمكين وضع الاستماع. يعرض الزر أدناه مربع حوار إذن iOS الذي لا يمكن لتتبع رأس Vocable التدخل فيه.
trans-unit.note: Listening mode empty state message for when microphone permissions are required and the user has not been shown the system permissions prompt yet
Listening mode empty state title for when microphone permissions are required and the user has not been shown the system permissions prompt yet
Listen mode empty state action that will allow the user to open the Settings app in order to grant speech recognition permissions.

trans-unit.source:
Vocable needs speech recognition to enable Listening Mode. Please enable speech recognition in the system Settings app.
You can also disable Listening Mode to hide this category in Vocable's settings.
trans-unit.target:
يحتاج Vocable إلى التعرف على الكلام لتمكين وضع الاستماع. يرجى تمكين التعرف على الكلام في تطبيق إعدادات النظام.
يمكنك أيضًا تعطيل وضع الاستماع لإخفاء هذه الفئة في إعدادات Vocable.
trans-unit.note: Listening mode empty state message for when speech recognition permissions are required, but the user has denied them
Listening mode empty state title for when speech recognition permissions are required, but the user has denied them
Listen mode empty state action that will allow the user to grant access to speech recognition permissions via the system permissions alert.

trans-unit.source: Vocable needs to request speech permissions to enable Listening Mode. This will present an iOS permission dialog that Vocable's head tracking cannot interract with.
trans-unit.target: يحتاج Vocable إلى طلب أذونات الكلام لتمكين وضع الاستماع. سيقدم هذا مربع حوار إذن iOS لا يمكن أن يتداخل معه تتبع رأس Vocable.
trans-unit.note: Listening mode empty state message for when speech recognition permissions are required and the user has not been shown the system permissions prompt yet
Listening mode empty state title for when speech recognition permissions are required and the user has not been shown the system permissions prompt yet

trans-unit.source: Speech services require one of the following features to be enabled on your device: Siri or Dictation. Please check your device settings and enable Siri or Dictation.
trans-unit.target: تتطلب خدمات الكلام تفعيل إحدى الميزات التالية على جهازك: Siri أو Dictation. يرجى التحقق من إعدادات جهازك وتمكين Siri أو Dictation.
trans-unit.note: Listen mode error state message for when Apple's speech to text service is unavailable
Listen mode error state title for when Apple's speech to text service is unavailable

trans-unit.source:
This %1$@ on %2$@ %3$@ does not support Listening Mode.
Listening Mode is currently only available in English and requires %5$@ to be enabled.
trans-unit.target:
هذا %1$@ في %2$@ %3$@ لا يدعم وضع الاستماع.
وضع الاستماع متاح حاليا باللغة الإنجليزية فقط ويتطلب تمكين %5$@.
trans-unit.note: Listening mode empty state message for when microphone permissions are required, but listening mode is unsupported
Listening mode empty state title for for when microphone permissions are required, but listening mode is unsupported
Thank you confirmation. This text appears after sharing with developer

trans-unit.source: Don’t like these responses? Anonymously share this question to help improve listening mode.
trans-unit.target: لا تحب هذه الردود؟ شارك هذا السؤال دون الكشف عن هويتك للمساعدة في تحسين وضع الاستماع.

Share with Developer button. The button appears if Listen mode could not generate a reponese.
Select something below to speak Hint Text
Page indicator progress format. \"Page x of n\"

Button in the Phrase close confirmation. This buton appears in an alert when there are edits made to the Category title and the user tries to close the keyboard without saving the changes. Pressing the button will allow editing the category title.

Button in the edit Phrase close confirmation. This buton appears in an alert when there are edits made to the Phrase and the user tries to close the keyboard without saving the changes. Pressing the button will not save any changes and close the keyboard view.

trans-unit.source: If you close without saving, your changes will be lost.
trans-unit.target: إذا أغلقت بدون حفظ ، فستفقد التغييرات.
trans-unit.note: Phrase editor close confirmation text. This text appears in an alert when there are edits made to the Phrase and the user tries to close the keyboard without saving the changes.
Duplicate Phrase alert cancel button. Text on this button appears on an alert where a duplicate phrase is being created. Pressing the button will allow continuing to edit category title
Duplicate Phrase alert create duplicate button. Pressing this button will allow for multiple categories with the same title.

trans-unit.target: هذه العبارة موجودة بالفعل. هل ترغب في إنشاء نسخة مكررة؟
trans-unit.note: Duplicate Phrase alert text. This text appears in an alert when a phrase is created with the same text as an existing phrase within the same category.
new entry saved to user favorites category Saved to user favorites category Saved to user favorites category toast title

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to reset Vocable to default settings? This action cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: هل أنت متأكد من أنك تريد إعادة تعيين Vocable إلى الإعدادات لافتراضية؟ لا يمكن التراجع عن هذا الإجراء.
trans-unit.note: Reset setting alert confirmation prompt
Reset setting alert Cancel button. This will cancel the reset operation.
Reset setting alert settings Reset button. This will continue with the reset operation.

trans-unit.source: Vocable failed to reset. Please try again or reinstall Vocable if the issue persists.
trans-unit.target: فشل إعادة تعيين Vocable. يرجى المحاولة مرة أخرى أو إعادة تثبيت Vocable إذا استمرت المشكلة.

Reset app settings success alert

trans-unit.target: أنت على وشك مغادرة تطبيق Vocable. قد تفقد التحكم في تتبع الرأس.

contact developers settings menu item

Listening Mode root settings menu item. Navigates the user to the Listening Mode settings screen where they can configure their preferences for listening mode.
view privacy policy settings menu item
reset all settings menu item

Settings screen header title

trans-unit.source:
This %1$@ on %2$@ %3$@ does not support Listening Mode.
Listening Mode is currently only available in English and requires %5$@ to be enabled.
trans-unit.target:
هذا %1$@ في %2$@ %3$@ لا يدعم وضع الاستماع.
وضع الاستماع متاح حاليا باللغة الإنجليزية فقط ويتطلب تمكين %5$@.
trans-unit.note: Footer text displayed in the Listening Mode preferences screen. This is only displayed if the user's device does not support Listening Mode because of it's language or lack of neural engine.
Title of Listening Mode preferences cell that toggles \"Hey Vocable\" shortcut feature on or off when selected

trans-unit.source: When this shortcut is enabled, anyone can say "Hey, Vocable" to prompt the app to navigate to the listening mode screen.
trans-unit.target: عند تمكين هذا الاختصار ، يمكن لأي شخص أن يقول "مرحبًا ، Vocable" مطالبة التطبيق بالانتقال إلى شاشة وضع الاستماع.
trans-unit.note: Footer text displayed in the Listening Mode preferences screen. This text describes the \"Hey Vocable\" feature, how it is activated, and how it automatically navigates the user to the Listening Mode screen.

trans-unit.source: When listening mode is enabled, anyone can ask a question out loud and Vocable will offer a selection of responses. Vocable supports either/or questions and questions that can be answered with yes, no, or a number.
trans-unit.target: عند تمكين وضع الاستماع ، يمكن لأي شخص طرح سؤال بصوت عالٍ وسيقدم Vocable مجموعة مختارة من الردود. يدعم Vocable الأسئلة والأسئلة التي يمكن الإجابة عليها بنعم أو لا أو برقم.
trans-unit.note: Footer text displayed in the Listening Mode preferences screen. This text describes the overall Listening Mode feature as well as the kinds of responses it can generate for the user.
Title of Listening Mode preferences cell that toggles Listening Mode on or off when selected
Listening Mode preferences screen title

trans-unit.source:
This %1$@ on %2$@ %3$@ does not support head tracking.
Head tracking is supported on all devices with a %4$@ camera, and on most devices with %6$@.
trans-unit.target:
هذا %1$@ على %2$@ %3$@ لا يدعم تتبع الرؤية.
تتبع الرأس مدعوم على جميع الأجهزة مع كاميرا %4$@ ، وعلى معظم الأجهزة مع %6$@.
trans-unit.note: Additonal footer text noting heading tracking compatibility

Button option for the Curson Sensitivity setting.
Button option for the Curson Sensitivity setting.
Button option for the Curson Sensitivity setting.
Text for a Timing and sensitivity setting. This setting is the sensitivity for the head tracking cursor.

Text for a Timing and sensitivity setting. This setting is the amount of time the head tracking cursor needs to stay on a button before it triggers it. Hove time can be adjusted in .5 sec increments from .5 to 5
Timing and sensitivity Header title. This text appears in the Settings flow when navigating into the Timing and Sensitivity setting
